contents.name: hello_world.txt
contents.contents: Yo sup world, what is up my brosky
contents.description: A slightly less than typical hello world file

contents.name: about_me.txt
contents.contents: I am a 13 year old hacker, fluent in PHP, Web Shtuff, and a multitude of other crap (Java, C#, etc.). I joined EternityIncurakai--a small startup of late middle and high schoolers--in early 2015 and currently work there as  a CTO. Collab.Center is my main project at the time, although I do enjoy creating and dumping small projects, many of which you can find here. In my personal life, I enjoy listening to weird music you've never heard of, making fun of weeaboos, while playing touhou & mixed strategy games.

contents.name: Collab.Center
contents.description: Online, real-time collaborative code editor. It's Google Docs for code!

contents.name: Flag of the Day
contents.description: A free popup for Windows that displays a random country's flag in the System tray. Included with many other useful features, such as country location, etc.

contents.name: Collab.Center

contents.description: A free popup for Windows that displays a random country's flag in the System tray. Included with many other useful features, such as country location, etc.

contents.name: Smile Spreader!
contents.description: You click the smiles, and the music gets progressivley worse. Slightly more fun than it sounds.

contents.name: Voxel Universe [VU]
contents.description: An experimental WebGL voxel-based game. Will continue if it starts to spark community interest

contents.name: Holmes Browser
contents.description: A C# Web browser, based on a self-modified version of Trident. Don't tell microsoft...

contents.name: note.txt
contents.contents: These projects have been abandoned, but that doesnt mean I wont go back to them. Other than that, these have all been dumped for mixed reasons
